name: Sword of Condemnation
desc: Deal Bless damage to all foes equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Yukimi's Defense. Grant 1 <link="s|111"><u>Blessing</u></link> stack to Yukimi and allies with <link="s|121"><u>Oath</u></link>.
descSimple:
Bless dmg to all foes (%s of Def).
Grant 1 Blessing to Yukimi and allies with Oath.
contentBG: A sword of light is summoned from the heavens, dealing Bless damage to enemies.

name: Sacral Glow
desc:
Grant a shield to 1 other ally equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Yukimi's Defense + <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>, and increase target's Defense by 35% of Yukimi's Defense (up to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>).
Also, decrease target's damage taken by 20% once. Lasts for 2 turns. Grant 2 <link="s|111"><u>Blessing</u></link> stacks, and grant target <link="s|121"><u>Oath</u></link> for 2 turns.
descSimple:
Grant shield to 1 ally (%s of Yukimi's Def + %s), increase Def by 35% of Yukimi's Def (max %s, 2 turns).
Decrease target's dmg taken by 20% once (2 turns).
Grant 2 Blessing and grant Oath.
contentBG: A righteous barrier of light emerges, serving as a shield for an ally.

name: Absolute Judgment
desc:
Deal Bless damage to 1 foe equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Yukimi's defense.
When Yukimi or an ally with an <link="s|121"><u>Oath</u></link> gain <link="s|111"><u>Blessing</u></link> stacks, gain 1 <link="s|116"><u>Gavel</u></link> stack.
When this skill is used after Gavel reaches 2 stacks, spend all Gavel stacks. For each Gavel stack spent, increase party's damage by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> for 1 turn, and grant a shield to party equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Yukimi's Defense for 2 turns.
descSimple:
Bless dmg to 1 foe (%s of Def). When Yukimi or ally with Oath gains Blessing, gain 1 Gavel.
When using a skill with 2 or more Gavel, spend all stacks. For each stack, increase party's dmg by %s (1 turn) and grant shield (%s of Yukimi's Def, 2 turns).
levelUpList: Skill Multiplier,Gavel Dmg Increase,Gavel Shield Multiplier
contentBG: The hammer of justice descends upon an enemy, dealing swift judgment and Bless damage.

name: Cross-Examination
desc:
When an ally has <link="s|121"><u>Oath</u></link>, increase their damage by 7% for every 1500 of Yukimi's Defense (up to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>).
(If Defense is less than 1500, increase damage by a percentage).

name: Urgent Matter
desc: At the end of Yukimi's action, grant a shield equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Yukimi's Defense to allies below 30% HP, and grant 1 <link="s|111"><u>Blessing</u></link> stack. Blessing lasts 2 turns. This effect activates once per battle.

name: Scales of Fairness
desc:
At the start of battle, grant <link="s|121"><u>Oath</u></link> to 1 random ally.
At the end of Yukimi's action, grant a shield equal to 24% of Yukimi's Defense to an ally with <link="s|121"><u>Oath</u></link>.
*Only 1 ally can have Oath at a time.
descSimple: At the start of battle, grant Oath to 1 random ally. After Yukimi acts, grant shield (24% of Yukimi's Def).

name: Legal Proceedings
desc: When an ally has <link="s|121"><u>Oath</u></link>, increase their Defense by 15%.

desc: When an ally with <link="s|121"><u>Oath</u></link> takes an action, gain 1 <link="s|111"><u>Blessing</u></link> stack.

desc: Highlight Enhanced: Grant 2 <link="s|111"><u>Blessing</u></link> stacks to all allies.

desc: Increase damage by 10% for Yukimi and allies with <link="s|121"><u>Oath</u></link>. Increase Bless damage by 2% for each <link="s|111"><u>Blessing</u></link> stack on Yukimi and allies with Oath (up to 20%).

desc: Deal Bless damage to 1 foe.

desc: Deal Bless damage to 1 foe equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Yukimi's Defense. Also increase party's Defense by 20% of Yukimi's Defense (up to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>) for 2 turns.

desc: When attacking a <link="s|105"><u>Windswept</u></link> foe with Saber Surge, <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> chance to increase hits by 1.

Stacks up to 3 times.
Increase Attack by 7% and Speed by 4 for 2 turns, based on the number of Right to Strike stacks. Right to Strike's duration is managed individually for each stack.

desc: Increase maximum <link="s|118"><u>Right to Strike</u></link> stacks to 5. Increase critical rate by 4% per Right to Strike stack.

name: Frozen Presence
desc: Deal Ice damage equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Yusuke's Defense to all foes. Inflict <link="s|103"><u>Freeze</u></link> on main target for 2 turns.
descSimple: Ice dmg to all foes (%s of Def). Inflict Freeze on main target (2 turns).
contentBG: A ghastly cold freezes the surrounding air, dealing Ice damage to enemies.

name: Bone-Chilling Cold
desc: Deal Ice damage to foes equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Yusuke's Defense (5 hits). When Yusuke has a shield, increase damage by 30%. From the second attack onwards, new targets take priority, and attacks on same foe deal 60% decreased damage each hit (minimum 20%).
descSimple:
Ice dmg to random foes (%s of Def, 5 hits).  user has a shield, increase dmg by 30%.
Repeated hits on same foe deal 60% decreased dmg per hit (min 20% of Def).
contentBG: A razor-sharp cold slices through foes, dealing Ice damage.

name: Keen Eye
desc:
Change the next activated <link="s|123"><u>Inspriation</u></link> to <link="s|172"><u>Imagination</u></link>. 
Imagination: Increase chance of counterattack to 100%, increase damage dealt by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Defense, and make damage dealt multi-target. If the effect is not activated by the start of Yusuke's next action, automatically activate it.
For 2 turns, gain a shield equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Yusuke's Defense  <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>, increase Fire resistance, and nullify spiritual ailments.
Also inflict <link="s|143"><u>Taunt</u></link> on all foes for 2 turns.
Coodown Time: 1 turn.
descSimple:
Next Inspiration changes to Imagination.
100% chance to counterattack, increase dmg by %s of Def, and target all foes. Gain shield (%s of Def + %s, 2 turns), increase Fire resistance, and nullify spiritual ailments (2 turns).
Taunt all foes (2 turns).
contentBG: His extaordinary artist's eye allows him to assess his surroundings, strengthening himself.

name: Painter's Focus
desc: Each time a shield is gained, increase damage dealt to foes by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> for 2 turns. Stacks up to 6 times.

name: Artist's Intuition
desc: Each time a shield is gained with Yusuke's skills, increase Yusuke's pierce rate by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> for 1 turn.

name: Inspiration
desc:
After taking damage from a foe's skill, 65% chance to activate <link="s|100"><u>Resonance</u></link> to counterattack, dealing Ice damage equal to 66% of Yusuke's Defense.
Change this effect to <link="s|172"><u>Imagination</u></link> by using a skill.
descSimple: 65% chance to activate Resonance after taking dmg from foe's skill, and perform Ice dmg counter (66% of Def).

name: Natural Talent
desc: Every 2 times Keen Eye is used, activate <link="s|172"><u>Imagination</u></link> 1 time as a follow-up. Counterattacks activated by this effect deal 70% of the original damage.

name: Both Beauty and Vice
desc: When Yusuke's HP is above 70%, increase counterattack damage dealt to foes by 35%.

name: A Breaktaking Sight
desc: Increase the skill levels of Keen Eye and Thief Tactics by 3.

name: Still Life
desc: <nobr>Highlight Enhanced: After using a Highlight, increase counterattack damage by 30% for 3 turns.

name: With a Single Stroke
desc: Increase the skill levels of Frozen Presence and Bone-Chilling Cold by 3.

name: Finishing Touches
desc:
<nobr>The effects of <link="s|123"><u>Inspiration</u></link> and <link="s|172"><u>Imagination</u></link> change to <link="s|173"><u>Vision & Emotion</u></link> and <link="s|174"><u>Creation</u></link>.
Each counterattack becomes 2 consecutive hits, each dealing 70% of the original damage. Also, increase counterattack pierce by 30%.

desc: Deal Ice damage to 1 foe.

name: Unexpected Tradgedy
desc:
Deal Curse damage to 1 foe equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Attack (3 hits), and gain 3 <link="s|160"><u>Verse of Hate</u></link> stacks.
When next gaining <link="s|153"><u>Verse</u></link> stacks, 25% chance to change to Verse of Hate stacks (max 2).
When spending Verse of Hate stacks to deal damage with <link="s|154"><u>Sonnet of Fate</u></link>, 30% chance to inflict <link="s|112"><u>Curse</u></link> for each Verse of Hate spent.
descSimple:
Curse dmg to 1 foe (%s of Atk, 3 hits), and gain 3 Verse of Hate.
When next gaining Verse, 25% chance to change to Verse of Hate (max 2).
When dealing damage with Sonnet of Fate, 30% chance for each Verse of Hate spent to inflict Curse on foe.
contentBG: Ruinous curses spell tragedy, dealing Curse damage to a single enemy.

name: Absurd Comedy
desc:
Deal Curse damage to all foes equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Attack (2 hits), and gain 2 <link="s|161"><u>Verse of Healing</u></link> stacks.
The next time <link="s|153"><u>Verse</u></link> stacks are gained, 25% chance to gain up to 2 Verse of Healing stacks.
When spending Verse of Healing stacks to deal damage with <link="s|154"><u>Sonnet of Fate</u></link>, restore HP to the ally with the lowest remaining HP by 7.5% of Sumi's Attack for each Verse of Healing that is spent.
descSimple:
Curse dmg to all foes (%s of Atk, 2 hits) and gain 2 Verse of Healing.
When next gaining Verse, 25% chance to change to Verse of Healing (max 2).
When activating Sonnet of Fate, restore HP of ally with lowest remaining HP by 7.5% of Sumi's Atk for each Verse of Healing spent.
contentBG: Impossible tales depicted in dark scrolls become reality, dealing Curse damage to enemies.

name: Tragicomedy of Love
desc:
Deal Curse damage to 1 foe equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Attack (5 hits), and gain 5 <link="s|162"><u>Verse of Passion</u></link> stacks.
When next gaining <link="s|153"><u>Verse</u></link> stacks, 25% chance to change to Verse of Passion stacks (max 2).
When spending Verse of Passion stacks to deal damage with <link="s|154"><u>Sonnet of Fate</u></link>, deal bonus damage equal to 7% of Attack as Almighty damage for each Verse of Passion spent.
descSimple:
Curse dmg to 1 foe (%s Atk, 5 hits) and gain 5 Verse of Passion.
When next gaining Verse, 25% chance to change to Verse of Passion (max 2).
When dealing dmg with Sonnet of Fate, deal bonus Almighty dmg to foe (7% Atk) per each Verse of Passion spent.
contentBG: An unspeakably hopeless love story penned by an inhuman author, dealing Curse damage to enemies.

name: The Other Prison
desc: Increase damage of <link="s|154"><u>Sonnet of Fate</u></link> on foes with <link="s|112"><u>Curse</u></link> by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>.

name: This Beautiful Woman
desc: For each Verse of Hate, Verse of Healing, or Verse of Passion stack spent, increase damage of <link="s|154"><u>Sonnet of Fate</u></link> by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>.

name: Sonnet of Fate
desc:
Each time an ally deals damage, gain 1 <link="s|153"><u>Verse</u></link> stack.
At 14+ Verse stacks, activate <link="s|100"><u>Resonance</u></link> and spend 14 stacks of Verse to deal follow-up Curse damage to the last foe Sumi targeted, equal to 65%/98%/130% of Attack (effect increases at level 1/50/70).
*Verse of Hate, Verse of Healing, and Verse of Passion all also count as Verse stacks.
descSimple: When an ally deals dmg, gain 1 Verse. At 14 Verse, activate Resonance, and deal Curse dmg to last foe Sumi targeted (65%/98%/130% of Atk, at Lv. 1/50/70).

name: Fishing Pond Master
desc: After using a skill, increase damage of the next <link="s|154"><u>Sonnet of Fate</u></link> by 40%.

name: Flight and Conflict
desc: Increase Attack of <link="s|154"><u>Sonnet of Fate</u></link> by 50%, and inflict <link="s|112"><u>Curse</u></link> on foes hit.

name: Passion for Creation
desc: Increase the skill levels of Unexpected Tragedy and Absurd Comedy by 2.

name: Scream from the Soul
desc: Highlight Enhanced: Increase damage of <link="s|154"><u>Sonnet of Fate</u></link> the next 4 times.

name: Throes of Creation
desc: Increase the skill levels of Tragicomedy of Love and Thief Tactics by 2.

name: Life Advice
desc:
After using a skill, the <link="s|160"><u>Verse of Hate</u></link>, <link="s|161"><u>Verse of Healing</u></link>, or <link="s|162"><u>Verse of Passion</u></link> gained activates 3 more times next turn.
If 2 or more different types of Verses are stacked, increase <link="s|154"><u>Sonnet of Fate</u></link> damage by 67%.

name: 1 MORE
desc: Deal Curse damage to 1 foe.

name: Highlight
desc: Deal Curse damage to 1 foe equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Attack (3 hits). Increase user's Attack for <link="s|154"><u>Sonnet of Fate</u></link> by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> up to 2 times.
descSimple: Curse dmg to 1 foe (%s of Atk, 3 hits). Increase user's Atk for Sonnet of Fate up to 2 times.

name: Ranged Attack
desc: Deal Gun damage to random foes (4 hits). Fire 4 shots at once, and can fire until out of ammo.

Deal Fire damage to all foes equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Attack, with 30% chance to inflict <link="s|102"><u>Burn</u></link>.
When Ann has <link="s|113"><u>La Vie en Rose</u></link>, deal 30% more damage.
descSimple:
Fire dmg to all foes (%s of Atk), 30% chance to inflict Burn.
When Ann has La Vie en Rose, increase skill dmg by 30%.
contentBG: A ball of fire as immense as the sun itself falls from the sky, dealing Fire damage to enemies.

name: Trifire
desc:
Deal Fire damage to 1 foe equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Attack, with 75% chance to inflict <link="s|102"><u>Burn</u></link>.
When Ann has <link="s|113"><u>La Vie en Rose</u></link>, and the foe's HP is below 50%, deal 30% bonus damage.
descSimple:
Fire dmg to 1 foe (%s Atk), 75% chance to inflict Burn.
When Ann has La Vie en Rose and foe's HP is below 50%, deal bonus dmg (30% of skill dmg).
contentBG: Four fireballs converge at the center and explode, dealing Fire damage to a single enemy.

name: Crimson Rose
desc:
Deal Fire damage to all foes equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Attack, and increase Ann's Attack by 20% for 2 turns.
When Ann has <link="s|113"><u>La Vie en Rose</u></link>, for 2 turns, decrease foes' Attack by 8% of Ann's Attack and increase her Attack by the same amount.
descSimple:
Fire dmg to all foes (%s of Atk), increase Ann's Atk by 20% (2 turns).
When Ann has La Vie en Rose, decrease foes' Atk by 8% of Ann's Atk and increase Ann's Atk by same amount (2 turns).
contentBG: Incandescent flames blossom into a an enormous rose, dealing Fire damage to enemies.

name: Falling Sun
desc:
Deal Fire damage to all foes equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Attack, with 30% chance to inflict <link="s|102"><u>Burn</u></link>.
When Ann has <link="s|113"><u>La Vie en Rose</u></link>, increase damage from skills by 30%.
descSimple:
Fire dmg to all foes (%s of Atk), 30% chance to inflict Burn.
When Ann has La Vie en Rose, increase skill dmg by 30%.
contentBG: A ball of fire as immense as the sun itself falls from the sky, dealing Fire damage to enemies.

name: Rising Tension
desc: Activate a <link="s|225"><u>Fire technical</u></link> when using a skill or Highlight. When <link="s|226"><u>Fireburn</u></link> activates, increase that skill or Highlight's damage by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>.

name: Carrot and Stick
desc: When <link="s|113"><u>La Vie en Rose</u></link> ends, restore HP to the ally with the lowest remaining HP by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Ann's Attack.

name: Passion
desc:
When dealing Fire damage with skills, gain 1 Passion stack. Gain up to 4 stacks of Passion with 1 skill.
When Passion reaches 4 stacks during Ann's action, gain La Vie en Rose for 1 turn.
La Vie en Rose: Increase Ann's Attack by 30%/40%/50% (effect increases at level 1/50/70).
When La Vie en Rose ends, all stacks of Passion will be lost at the beginning of the next action.
*Cannot gain La Vie en Rose consecutively on Ann's next action.
descSimple:
When dealing Fire dmg to foes, gain 1 Passion.
When Passion reaches 4, gain La Vie en Rose, and increase Atk (1 turn).

name: Seguidilla
desc: When <link="s|113"><u>La Vie en Rose</u></link> is active, increase party's Attack by 25% for 1 turn.

name: Marriage of Flames
desc: When <link="s|113"><u>La Vie en Rose</u></link> ends, activate 2 follow-up attacks, dealing Fire damage equal to 66% of Ann's Attack to random foes.

name: Beautiful Sins
desc: Increase the skill levels of Falling Sun and Thief Tactics by 3.

name: Hearts on Fire
desc: Highlight Enhanced: When Ann uses a Highlight, increase her Attack by 100% for 1 turn.

name: Makeup
desc: Increase the skill levels of Crimson Rose and Trifire by 3.

name: Time for Punishment
desc:
When attacking foes with Fire skills, 60% chance to gain 1 Passion stack.
When Ann has <link="s|113"><u>La Vie en Rose</u></link>, increase Fire damage by 11% per Passion stack (up to 110%).

name: 1 MORE
desc: Deal Fire damage to 1 foe.

name: Highlight
desc: Deal Fire damage to all foes equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Attack. Increase damage of Ann's Fire skills by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> for 1 turn.
descSimple:
Fire dmg to all foes (%s of Atk).
Increase Fire dmg by %s (1 turn).

name: Ranged Attack
desc: Deal Gun damage to random foes. Fire 3 shots at once, and can fire until out of ammo.

name: Melee Attack
desc: Deal Physical damage to 1 foe.

name: Sanctioned Drift
desc:
Deal Nuclear damage to foe equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Attack (5 hits). From the second attack onwards, prioritize new targets, and hits on same foe deal <color=#FFFC40>20%</color> decreased damage each hit.
Inflict <link="s|179"><u>Radiation</u></link> on main target for 2 turns.
When the attack target has an elemental ailment, activate a <link="s|211"><u>Technical</u></link> to deal more Nuclear damage equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Attack.
descSimple: Nuke dmg to random foes (5 hits). If same foe hit multiple times, decrease dmg. If target has elemental ailment, activate Technical, deal bonus Nuke dmg and inflict Radiation.
contentBG: Johanna goes full throttle, dealing Nuclear damage to enemies.

name: President's Prowess
desc:
Restore HP to 1 ally equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Makoto's Attack + <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>, and increase Makoto's Attack by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> for 2 turns.
Also gain 2 <link="s|177"><u>Tenacity</u></link> stacks, and gain additional Tenacity stacks for each elemental ailment on foes.
descSimple: Restore 1 ally's HP and increase Makoto's Atk (2 turns). Gain 2 Tenacity, and gain more for every elemental ailment on foes.
contentBG: Draws on her skills as student council president to support her party, healing allies and strengthening herself.

name: Nuclear Fury
desc:
Deal Nuclear damage to 1 foe equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Attack. If main target has an elemental ailment, activate a <link="s|211"><u>Technical</u></link>, dealing bonus Nuclear damage equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Attack, and gain 2 <link="s|177"><u>Tenacity</u></link> stacks.
When <link="s|178"><u>Crash Out</u></link> is active, change this skill to Thermonuclear Fury.
Thermonuclear Fury: Deal Nuclear damage to 1 foe equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Attack. For each different elemental ailment the foe has, activate a <link="s|211"><u>Technical</u></link>, dealing bonus Nuclear damage equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Attack (up to 3 hits).
descSimple: Nuke dmg to 1 foe. If target has elemental ailment, activate Technical, deal bonus dmg, and gain 2 Tenacity. With Crash Out, evolve to Thermonuclear Fury.
levelUpList: Skill Multiplier,Bonus Dmg Multiplier,Thermonuclear Fury Skill Mult.,Thermonuclear Fury Bonus Dmg Mult.
contentBG: Unleashes a pent-up explosion of rage, dealing Nuclear damage to enemies.

name: Thermonuclear Fury
desc: Deal Nuclear damage to 1 foe equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Attack. If the main target has an elemental ailment, for each different elemental ailment, activate a <link="s|211"><u>Technical</u></link>, dealing bonus Nuclear damage equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Attack (up to 3 hits).
descSimple: Nuke dmg to 1 foe. If target has elemental ailment, activate Technical for each unique elemental ailment, and deal bonus Nuke dmg up to 3 times.
contentBG: Unleashes a pent-up explosion of rage, dealing Nuclear damage to enemies.

name: Crash Out
desc: AAAAAA==

name: Chief Strategist
desc: During battle, for each different type of elemental ailment on foes, increase Attack by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>.

name: Unshakeable Will
desc: At the start of battle, increase damage reduction rate by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>, and when <link="s|178"><u>Crash Out</u></link> is active, increase damage reduction rate by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> more (up to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>).

name: Enraged Usurper
desc:
When attacking a foe with a skill, gain 1 <link="s|177"><u>Tenacity</u></link> stack. During battle, for each different type of elemental ailment on foes, gain 1 more Tenacity stack.
On Makoto's action, if at 5 Tenacity stacks, activate <link="s|178"><u>Crash Out</u></link>, increasing Attack by 40% and Defense by 20%, and changing Nuclear Fury to Thermonuclear Fury for 2 turns. When Crash Out ends, lose all Tenacity stacks.
descSimple: When attacking foes with skills, gain 1 Tenacity. For each unique elemental ailment on foes, gain more Tenacity. When Tenacity reaches 5, change to Crash Out.

name: Execution of Justice
desc:
At the start of battle, gain 5 stacks of <link="s|177"><u>Tenacity</u></link>, and immediately activate <link="s|178"><u>Crash Out</u></link>.
When Crash Out is active, increase Attack by 50% more.

name: Hot and Cold
desc: When <link="s|178"><u>Crash Out</u></link> is active, inflict random elemental ailments on foes, and for each different type of elemental ailment, increase Makoto's pierce by 6%.

name: Full Throttle
desc: Increase the skill levels of Sanctioned Drift and Nuclear Fury by 3.

name: Fist of the Phantom Star
desc: Highlight Enhanced: Increase maximum stacks of Frenzied Voltage to 4. Also, inflict up to 4 elemental ailments on foes, and skill damage increases up to 4 times.

name: Feel My Wrath
desc: Increase the skill levels of President's Prowess and Thief Tactics by 3.

name: Fist of Justice!
desc: When <link="s|178"><u>Crash Out</u></link> is active, Makoto can gain an extra action. Also, decrease SP cost of Thermonuclear Fury by <color=#FFFC40>33%</color>.

name: 1 MORE
desc: Deal Nuclear damage to 1 foe.

name: Highlight
desc: Deal Nuclear damage to 1 foe equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Attack, gain 2 Frenzied Voltage stacks, and activate the following effects: Spend 1 Frenzied Voltage stack to inflict 1 random elemental ailment on foes, continuing until foes have 2 elemental ailments. Spend all remaining Frenzied Voltage stacks to increase the damage of this skill by 20% per stack.
descSimple: Nuke dmg to 1 foe. Gain 2 Frenzied Voltage. Spend Frenzied Voltage to inflict up to 2 elemental ailments on foe and deal more dmg.

name: Ranged Attack
desc: Deal Gun damage to 1 foe. Can fire until out of ammo.

name: Melee Attack
desc: Deal Physical damage to 1 foe.

name: Blade Dancer
desc: AAAAAA==

name: Blade Dancer
desc: AAAAAA==

name: Frost Lily
desc: Deal Ice damage to all foes equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Attack. <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> chance to inflict <link="s|103"><u>Freeze</u></link>.
descSimple: Ice dmg to all foes (%s of Atk), %s chance to inflict Freeze.
contentBG: Frozen flowers blossom, dealing Ice damage to enemies.

name: Winter Storm
desc: Deal Ice damage to 1 foe equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Attack. Gain 4 <link="s|119"><u>Ice Crystal</u></link> stacks.
descSimple: Ice dmg to 1 foe (%s of Atk), gain 4 Ice Crystal.
contentBG: A flurry of hailstones and icicles descends upon an enemy, dealing Ice damage.

name: Durandal of Ice
desc:
Deal Ice damage to 1 foe equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Attack. When Kotone has Parhelion or 10+ <link="s|119"><u>Ice Crystal</u></link> stacks, increase damage based on foe's missing HP (up to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>).
When Blade Dancer is activated, increase damage dealt based on foe's missing HP (up to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>).
descSimple:
Ice dmg to 1 foe (%s of Atk). When Kotone has Parhelion or 10+ Ice Crystal, increase dmg based on foe's missing HP (max %s).
Increase Blade Dancer dmg based on foe's missing HP.
contentBG: A great blade of ice plunges down, dealing Ice damage to a single foe.

name: Frozen in Time
desc: When damaging foes with Blade Dancer, <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> chance to inflict <link="s|103"><u>Freeze</u></link>.

name: State of Selflessness
desc: When Kotone defeats a foe, gain <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> <link="s|119"><u>Ice Crystal</u></link> stacks.

name: Blade Dancer
desc:
On ally's action, gain 1 <link="s|119"><u>Ice Crystal</u></link> stack. Stacks up to 12 times. After using a skill, when Ice Crystal reaches 10 stacks, activate <link="s|100"><u>Resonance</u></link>, spending 10 Ice Crystal stacks to deal 65% follow-up Ice damage to the main target. This Resonance is guaranteed to be a critical hit.
When using Frost Lily or Winter Storm, if the Resonance is activated, gain Parhelion.
Parhelion is used to strengthen Durandal of Ice.
descSimple:
When an ally acts, gain 1 Ice Crystal. Stacks up to 12.
When using a skill, activate Resonance, spend 10 Ice Crystal and deal follow-up Ice dmg to foes.
When Ice Lily or Winter Storm is used, gain Parhelion and increase dmg of next Durandal of Ice.

name: Camel Spin
desc: At the end of Kotone's action, gain a shield equal to 15% of Attack for 1 turn.

name: Ice Princess
desc: Increase <link="s|100">Resonance</u></link> damage based on foe's missing HP (up to 50%).

name: Heart of Ice
desc: Increase the skill levels of Frost Lily and Winter Storm by 2.

name: Resilience
desc: Highlight Enhanced: Increase Highlight damage up to 60%.

name: Axel Jump
desc: Increase the skill levels of Durandal of Ice and Thief Tactics by 2.

name: Opening Ceremony
desc: At the start of battle, gain 4 <link="s|119"><u>Ice Crystal</u></link> stacks. Increase the maximum number of <link="s|119"><u>Ice Crystal</u></link> stacks to 15.

name: 1 MORE
desc: Deal Ice damage to 1 foe.

name: Highlight
desc: Deal Ice damage to 1 foe equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Attack. Increase damage based on foe's missing HP. When foe's HP is below 20%, increase by up to 30%.
descSimple: Deal Ice dmg to 1 foe (%s of Atk). Increase dmg based on foe's missing HP. When foe's HP is below 20%, increase by up to 30%.
contentBG: Deals colossal Ice damage to all enemies. The lower the enemy's HP, the higher the damage.

name: Ranged Attack
desc: Deal Gun damage to 1 foe. Can fire until out of ammo.

name: Melee Attack
desc: Deal Physical damage to 1 foe.

name: Guardian of Life
desc: When an ally is KO'd, instantly revive them and restore HP. Activates once per battle.

name: Nurse's Light
desc: Deal Bless damage to 1 foe equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Minami's max HP, and grant 1 <link="s|111"><u>Blessing</u></link> stack to party. Also gain 1 <link="s|169"><u>Diagnosis</u></link> stack.
descSimple:
Bless dmg to 1 foe (%s of max HP).
Grant 1 Blessing to party. Gain 1 Diagnosis.
contentBG: A light repelling all injuries and illnesses, granting Blessings to allies and dealing Bless damage to an enemy.

name: Healing Grace
desc:
Restore HP equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Minami's max HP + <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> to the ally with the lowest HP and 1 selected ally, and cure 2 debuffs.
Grant 1 <link="s|111"><u>Blessing</u></link> stack to allies healed, and grant Minami 1 <link="s|169"><u>Diagnosis</u></link> stack.
At the start of each turn for 2 turns, restore HP of allies healed by this skill equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Minami's max HP + <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>.
descSimple:
Restore HP (%s of Minami's max HP + %s) and cure 2 debuffs on target and ally with lowest HP.
Grant 1 Blessing to targets, and restore HP (%s of Minami's max HP + %s) at start of next 2 turns. Gain 1 Diagnosis.
levelUpList: Healing Multiplier,Base Healing,Cont. Healing Multiplier,Base Cont. Healing
contentBG: A warm light that heals wounds, granting Blessings, curing debuffs, and healing allies.

name: Compassionate Cure
desc:
Spend all <link="s|169"><u>Diagnosis</u></link> stacks, and restore HP to selected ally equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Minami's max HP + <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>.
Also restore HP of the ally with the lowest HP with this effect 2 times.
For each Diagnosis stack, activate this effect 1 more time.
For each Diagnosis stack spent, increase the max HP of allies (other than Minami) by <color=#FFFC40>7.5%</color> of Minami's max HP for 2 turns (up to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>).
descSimple:
Spend all Diagnosis, and restore HP (%s of Minami's max HP + %s) of target and ally with lowest HP (2 times).
For each Diagnosis, activate this effect 1 more time.
For each Diagnosis spent, increase the max HP of allies (other than Minami) by 7.5% of Minami's max HP (max %s, 2 turns).
contentBG: Channels a deep affection and spiritual devotion, healing allies.

name: Compassionate Cure
desc:
Spend all <link="s|169"><u>Diagnosis</u></link> stacks, and restore HP to selected ally equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Minami's max HP + <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>.
Also restore HP of the ally with the lowest HP with this effect 2 times.
For each Diagnosis stack, activate this effect 1 more time.
For each Diagnosis stack spent, increase the max HP of allies (other than Minami) by <color=#FFFC40>7.5%</color> of Minami's max HP for 2 turns (up to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>).
descSimple:
Spend all Diagnosis, and restore HP (%s of Minami's max HP + %s) of target and ally with lowest HP (2 times).
For each Diagnosis, activate this effect 1 more time.
For each Diagnosis spent, increase the max HP of allies (other than Minami) by 7.5% of Minami's max HP (max %s, 2 turns).
contentBG: Channels a deep affection and spiritual devotion, healing allies.

name: Health Comes First
desc: After Minami heals an ally, increase that ally's damage by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> + (<color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>  target ally's <link="s|111"><u>Blessing</u></link> stacks) for 1 turn (up to 30%).

name: Peace of Mind
desc: At the start of battle, increase party's max HP by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Minami's max HP (up to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>).

name: Nurse's Oath
desc: At the start of battle, gain 1 <link="s|169"><u>Diagnosis</u></link> stack. At the start of Minami's turn, if any ally's HP is below 70%, gain Diagnosis. Diagnosis stacks up to 2 times.
descSimple:
At start of battle, gain 1 Diagnosis.
At start of Minami's action, gain 1 Diagnosis if any ally is under 70% HP.

name: Angel in White
desc: When healing allies above max HP, increase target's pierce by 20% for 2 turns.

name: Clinical Care
desc: When using Healing Grace, heal 1 more ally, and if target's HP is below 50%, increase healing effect by 20%.

name: Practical Care
desc: Increase the skill levels of Healing Grace and Thief Tactics by 3.

name: Nursing Practice
desc: Highlight Enhanced: The duration of the max HP increase and healing effect increase are extended by 1 turn.

name: Undying Devotion
desc: Increase the skill levels of Nurse's Light and Compassionate Cure by 3.

name: Guardian of Life
desc: Restore a KO'd ally's HP equal to 40% of Minami's max HP + 1200. This effect can be activated once per battle.

name: 1 MORE
desc: Deal Bless damage to 1 foe.

name: Highlight
desc:
Restore party's HP by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Minami's max HP + <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>, and cure 1 debuff.
Increase party's max HP by <color=#FFFC40>16.5%</color> of Minami's max HP (up to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>) for 2 turns. At the end of an action, restore HP equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Minami's max HP + <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> for 1 turn.
descSimple:
Restore party's HP (%s of Minami's max HP + %s), and cure 1 debuff.
Increase party's max HP by 16.5% of Minami's max HP (max %s, 2 turns).
At the end of action, restore HP (%s of Minami's max HP + %s) for 1 turn.

name: Extra Action
desc: AAAAAA==

name: Trickster's Plunder
desc: Deal Curse damage to all foes equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Attack. 20% chance to inflict <link="s|112"><u>Curse</u></link>. Also gain 1 <link="s|124"><u>Will of Rebellion</u></link> stack.
descSimple: Curse dmg to all foes (%s of Atk). 20% chance to inflict Curse. Gain 1 Will of Rebellion.
contentBG: Calls upon the cursed demon's right hand, dealing Curse damage to enemies.

name: Phantom Omen
desc: Deal Curse damage to 1 foe equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Attack. When only 1 foe is present, gain 2 <link="s|124"><u>Will of Rebellion</u></link> stacks.
descSimple:
Curse dmg to 1 foe (%s of Atk).
If 1 foe is present, gain 2 Will of Rebellion.
contentBG: A life-reaping scythe approaches from behind, dealing Curse damage a single foe.

name: Arsne's Chains
desc: Deal Curse damage to all foes equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Attack. When used on an Extra Action, increase damage by 25%. When attacking foes with debuffs, increase damage by 25% more.
descSimple:
Curse dmg to all foes (%s of Atk).
Increase dmg by 25% on Extra Action.
Increase dmg by 25% more when foe has debuff.
contentBG: Through force of will, break free from the hellbinding chains, dealing Curse damage to enemies.

name: Resistance
desc: Increase Attack by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> for each <link="s|124"><u>Will of Rebellion</u></link> stack.

name: Adverse Resolve
desc: Increase damage on Extra Actions by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>.

name: Rebellion Resurgence
desc:
At the end of Ren's action, gain 1 <link="s|124"><u>Will of Rebellion</u></link> stack for each foe with less than 60% HP (up to 5 stacks).
When Will of Rebellion reaches 3 stacks, gain an extra action.
An additional extra action cannot be gained during the extra action. (Extra actions do not affect the duration of effects with turn limits).
At the end of an extra action, spend 3 Will of Rebellion stacks.
*Can gain 1 Will of Rebellion stack per foe per battle.
descSimple: At the end of Ren's action, gain 1 Will of Rebellion for each foe with 60% or less HP. With 3+ Will of Rebellion and not already on extra action, Ren takes an extra action.

name: Calling Card
desc: Increase skill damage to the main target by 30%, and increase skill damage to other targets by 10%.

name: Meditate
desc: On an Extra Action, decrease SP cost of skills by 80%. When Ren's SP is above 60%, increase Attack by 50%.

name: Secret Maneuvers
desc: Increase the skill levels of Arsne's Chains and Thief Tactics by 3.

name: Highway Robbery
desc: Highlight Enhanced: Increase number of <link="s|124"><u>Will of Rebellion</u></link> stacks gained to 3.

name: Moonlit Evening
desc: Increase the skill levels of Trickster's Plunder and Phantom Omen by 3.

name: Merciless Pursuit
desc:
After taking an extra action, if there are foes with below 25% HP, deal damage to those foes equal to up to 250% of Ren's Attack (once per enemy per battle).
After using a skill on an extra action, deal Curse damage equal to 50% of Attack to all foes.

name: 1 MORE
desc: Deal Curse damage to 1 foe.

name: Highlight
desc: Deal Curse damage to all foes equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Attack, and gain 1 <link="s|124"><u>Will of Rebellion</u></link> stack.
descSimple:
Curse dmg to all foes (%s of Atk).
Gain 1 Will of Rebellion.

name: Ranged Attack
desc: Deal Gun damage to 1 foe. Can fire until out of ammo.

name: Little Mermaid's Song
desc:
Grant a shield to party equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Miyu's Defense + <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> for 2 turns, and restore 4 SP.
When an ally's shield is broken, decrease cooldown by 1 action.
Cooldown Time: 8 ally actions
descSimple:
Grant a shield to party (%s of Miyu's Def + %s, 2 turns), and restore 4 SP.
When ally's shield is broken, decrease cooldown by 1 action.
contentBG: Create a protective bubble that can withstand even the pressures of the deepest oceans, granting a shield to allies.

name: Poseidon's Blessing
desc:
For 2 turns, grant a shield to 1 ally equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Miyu's Defense + <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> and decrease weakness damage taken by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>. Grant 2 Down Points and 2 <link="s|144"><u>Seashell</u></link> stacks.
Cooldown Time: 8 ally actions.
descSimple:
Grant shield to 1 ally (%s of Miyu's Def + %s, 2 turns). Decrease weakness dmg taken by %s (2 turns).
Gain 2 Down Points and 2 Seashell.
levelUpList: Shield Def Multiplier,Base Shield,Weakness Dmg Taken Decrease
contentBG: A blessing from the envoys of Poseidon, activating a shield that protects an ally.

name: Tide of Dreams
desc:
Grant a shield to all allies equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Miyu's Defense + <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> + number of <link="s|144"><u>Seashell</u></link> stacks on party  (<color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Miyu's Defense + <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>) for 3 turns.
Also, if an ally has 4 or more Seashell stacks, increase damage by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> for each stack.
The damage increase effect lasts for 3 turns or until shield is broken, and then lose 2 Seashell stacks.
Cooldown Time: 12 ally actions
descSimple:
Grant shield to party (%s of Miyu's Def + %s, 3 turns). Increase Shield based on target's Seashell stack. With 4+ Seashell, increase dmg.
Dmg increase lasts 3 turns or until Shield is destroyed, then lose 2 Seashell.
levelUpList: Shield Def Multiplier,Base Shield,Seashell Def Multiplier,Seashell Base Shield,Seashell Dmg Increase
contentBG: A barrier of white waves wash over all, activating a shield that protects allies.

name: Whispering Waves
desc: Increase shield effect by number of party's <link="s|144"><u>Seashell</u></link> stacks  <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>.

name: I'll Protect You!
desc: Increase ally's Defense by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> for each <link="s|144"><u>Seashell</u></link> stack.

name: Guardian of the Sea
desc:
When Miyu grants a shield, grant 1 <link="s|144"><u>Seashell</u></link> stack to that ally, up to 6.
When gaining a Seashell stack, increase shield received by 1% for each stack.
Whenever reaching a set number of Seashell stacks, activate the following effects, based on Miyu's level (1/50/70+).
2 stacks: Increase Defense by 8%/12%/16%.
4 stacks: Increase Attack by 8%/12%/16%.
6 stacks: Increase Defense by 12%/18%/24%.
descSimple: When granting a shield, grant Seashell to all allies, and deal additional effects based on stack.

name: Marionette Dance
desc: At the start of battle, grant party 1 <link="s|144"><u>Seashell</u></link> stack.

name: For my Big Bro!
desc: When an ally's remaining HP is below 30%, grant them a shield equal to 28% of Miyu's Defense + 660 for 2 turns. This effect can be activated once per battle.

name: Self-Reliance
desc: Increase the skill levels of Little Mermaid's Song and Poseidon's Blessing by 2.

name: Chasing Dreams
desc: When an ally uses a Highlight, grant that ally a shield equal to 16% of Miyu's Defense + 480 for 2 turns.

name: Street Performer
desc: Increase the skill level of Tide of Dreams increase by 2.

name: Runaway
desc:
Increase maximum number of <link="s|144"><u>Seashell</u></link> stacks to 8.
When Seashell reaches 8 stacks, increase damage by 20%.

name: Enhance Stat
desc: Increase party's stats by 15% of Miyu's stats.

1 or more: Increase Attack by 10%.
2 or more: Increase Nuclear damage by 10%.
3 or more: Increase Pierce by 8%.

name: Tempting Build
desc:
Increase party's Attack by 8% of Yumi's Attack for 3 turns (up to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>).
When an ally uses a skill, spend 1 <link="s|180"><u>Cocktail</u></link> to strengthen that skill's effects. Higher quality Cocktails will be used first. <link="s|182"><u>Tailor-Made</u></link>, <link="s|183"><u>Standard</u></link>, and <link="s|184"><u>Basic</u></link> Cocktails will increase skill effects by 120%, 100%, and 50% respectively.
Cooldown Time: 6 ally actions.
descSimple: Increase party's Atk (3 turns). When an ally uses a skill, spend 1 Cocktail to strengthen skill effect.
contentBG: Mixes together a dazzling cocktail that shines like a jewel, powering up allies.

name: Charming Stare
desc:
Increase 1 ally's Attack by 1% for every 250 of Yumi's Attack (up to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>) and their max HP by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> for 2 turns. Also, when the target deals damage to a foe, restore the target's HP by 2% of damage dealt for 1 turn.
When activating a skill, spend 1 <link="s|184"><u>Basic</u></link> or <link="s|183"><u>Standard</u></link> <link="s|180"><u>Cocktail</u></link> to gain 1 <link="s|182"><u>Tailor-Made</u></link> Cocktail.
Cooldown Time: 4 ally actions.
descSimple: Increase 1 ally's Attack and max HP (2 turns). Spend 1 Basic or Standard Cocktail and gain 1 Tailor-Made Coctail.
contentBG: Stirs up a fragrant cocktail, powering up an ally.

name: Energy Shake
desc:
Spend all <link="s|180"><u>Cocktails</u></link> to increase party's attribute damage based on the targeted ally's attribute.
Increase damage by 1% for every 250 of Yumi's Attack (up to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>). <link="s|182"><u>Tailor-Made</u></link>, <link="s|183"><u>Standard</u></link>, and <link="s|184"><u>Basic</u></link> Cocktails will increase damage by an additional 120%, 100%, and 50% respectively.
Also, increase effects on targeted ally by 1.2 times for 2 turns.
Cooldown Time: 8 ally actions. (This skill requires Cocktails.)
descSimple: Spend all Cocktails, increase party's attribute damage based on attribute of selected target. Effect changes based on quality of Cocktail spent. Increase effect 1.2 times for main target (2 turns).
contentBG: Stirs up a mellow cocktail, powering up all allies.

name: Cocktail Party
desc: Increase party's attribute damage by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> based on main attributes of party members.

name: Taking Orders
desc: At the start of the battle, randomly gain <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> <link="s|181"><u>Mixers</u></link> based on the main attributes of party members.

name: Expert Bartender
desc:
When an ally deals damage with a skill, Resonance, or Highlight, Yumi gains 1 Mixer of the corresponding attribute.
At 3 stacks, they become a <link="s|180"><u>Cocktail</u></link> (max 3).
If 3 Mixers have the same attribute, the Cocktail becomes <link="s|182"><u>Tailor-Made</u></link>. If 2 are the same, it becomes <link="s|183"><u>Standard</u></link>. If all 3 are different, it becomes <link="s|184"><u>Basic</u></link>.
Using skills will spend <link="s|180"><u>Cocktails</u></link> to activate different effects for the party and restore 6 SP to party.
descSimple: When an ally deals skill, Resonance, or Highlight dmg, Yumi gains 1 Mixer of the corresponding attribute. With 3+ Mixers, change to a Cocktail. When Yumi uses a skill, spend Cocktail to grant various effects and restore party's SP.

name: Mojito
desc: Gain 1 random <link="s|181">Mixer<u></u></link> when spending a <link="s|180"><u>Cocktail</u></link>.

name: Martini
desc: Increase party's Attack by 16% when spending a <link="s|180"><u>Cocktail</u></link>. Lasts for 1 turn.

name: Screwdriver
desc: Increase the skill levels of Charming Stare and Energy Shake by 3.

name: Old Fashioned
desc:
Highlight Enhanced: When an ally uses Highlight, increase their Attack by 10% for 1 turn.
Gain 1 <link="s|182"><u>Tailor-Made</u></link> Cocktail.

name: Bloody Mary
desc: Increase the skill level of Tempting Build by 3.

name: XYZ
desc:
The maximum number of <link="s|180"><u>Cocktails</u></link> increases to 4.
At the start of battle, gain 1 <link="s|182"><u>Tailor-Made</u></link> Cocktail. After every 3 Cocktails, gain 1 more Tailor-Made cocktail.

Grant <link="s|190"><u>Costar</u></link> to 1 ally, and increase their Attack by 24% of Chord's Attack (max <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>) for 3 turns.
Only 1 ally can be a Costar at a time.

desc:
Immediately activate an ally's Highlight, and increase the damage dealt by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>.
This skill does not affect the target's Highlight cooldown time, even if it activates a Highlight.
descSimple: Immediately activate an ally's Highlight, and increase its dmg.
contentBG: Revs up the crowd with an exciting guitar solo, instantly activating an ally's Highlight.

desc:
After an ally uses a Highlight, increase target's Attack by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> for 1 turn.
When the target has <link="s|190"><u>Costar</u></link>, increase effects by 1.5 times.

name: Chorus Effect
desc: After an ally uses a Highlight, the ally with the lowest HP recovers HP equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Chord's Attack + <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>.

name: Opening Act
desc:
When using Catchy Hook, increase Attack by 20% (max 40%) for that battle.
Catchy Hook has a cooldown time of 1 turn before it can be used. Increase the cooldown time each time Catchy Hook is used (max 3 turns).
descSimple: When using Catchy Hook, increase own Atk for the battle. Increase cooldown time each time Catchy Hook is used.

name: Hard Rock
desc: At the start of battle, grant <link="s|190"><u>Costar</u></link> to the Assassin or Sweeper with the highest Attack, and increase target's critical rate by 15%.

desc: After using Catchy Hook, increase targeted ally's damage by 30% for 1 turn.

name: Amplifier
desc: Increase the skill levels of Distortion and Catchy Hook by 3.

name: Spotlight
desc: Highlight Enhanced: The duration of this effect increases to 6 ally actions. Additionally, the Highlight gauge can be filled up to 60%, and Highlight activation cooldown for all other allies decreased by 1 turn.

desc: Increase the skill levels of Unison Notes and Thief Tactics by 3.

name: Spirit of Rock
desc:
At the start of battle, Catchy Hook can be used immediately. Cooldown time is permanently decreased by 1 turn (down to 2 turns).
Every time Catchy Hook is used, increase party's damage by 15%. Stacks up to 2 times.

desc: Deal Electric damage to 1 foe.

For 4 ally actions, increase party's damage by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>.

While active, fill Highlight gauge.

name: Scattered Plum Blossoms
desc:
Decrease all foes' Defense by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> for 2 turns.
When Riko's Speed is at 100 or more, decrease Defense by 4.9% for every 10 points of Speed over 100, up to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>.
 Also inflict <link="s|188"><u>Insight</u></link> on the main target.
Cooldown Time: 4 ally actions.
descSimple: Decrease all foes' Def (2 turns). Inflict Insight on target.
levelUpList: Base Def Decrease Multiplier,Def Decrease Cap
contentBG: The scent of fragrant plum blossoms distracts opponents, decreasing their Defense.

name: Dreams in the Mist
desc:
Increase all foes' damage taken by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> for 2 turns.
When an ally lowers a foe's Down Points or knocks down a foe, decrease cooldown time by 1. When cooldown time reaches 0, activate this skill.
Cooldown Time: 8 ally actions
descSimple: Increase foe's dmg taken (2 turns). If an ally lowers a foe's Down Points or knocks down a foe, reduce cooldown time by 1. When cooldown time reaches 0, activate this skill.
contentBG: Dazzles opponents with a shower of plum blossoms, increasing their damage taken.

name: Verngale Petals
desc:
Spend 1 <link="s|187"><u>Intel</u></link> stack to grant Fair Winds to party for 1 turn and restore targeted ally's HP by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>.
Fair Winds: Increase damage by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>. Increase more based on Riko's Speed.
When Riko's Speed is at 100 or more, increase Attack by 1.05% for every 10 points of Speed over 100, up to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>.
Cooldown Time: 8 ally actions. (Cannot be used when Intel is less than 5.)
descSimple: Spend all Intel, and grant Fair Winds to 1 ally (1 turn). Selected ally also recovers HP.
contentBG: Provides a rundown on the enemy, increasing allies' healing and damage.

name: Springtime Tempest
desc:
At the start of battle, if Riko's Speed is at 100 or more, increase party's HP by 6, Attack by 2, and Defense by 2 for every 1 point of Speed above 100.
Increase HP up to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>, Attack up to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>, and Defense up to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>.

name: Plum Blossom Glory
desc: Increase 1 More and All-Out Attack damage by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>.

name: Snowfall Fragrance
desc:
Every 3 ally actions, inflict <link="s|188"><u>Insight</u></link> on the foe with the most Down Points.
Insight: Increase damage taken by 6%. When the target takes weakness damage, Riko gains 2 <link="s|187"><u>Intel</u></link> stacks. When the target takes non-weakness damage, decrease Down Points by 1 and gain 1 Intel stack. Stacks up to 8 times.
descSimple: Every 3 ally actions, inflict Insight on foe with highest Down points.

descSimple: Bless dmg (%s of Atk) to all foes. With Midsummer, spend 10% of Motoha's HP to deal bonus Bless dmg (%s of Atk) to all foes.
contentBG: Dazzling waves surge forth from the ocean, cooling down all enemies.

name: Relaxing Vacation
desc: Deal Bless damage to 1 foe equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Attack, and heal up to 20% of Motoha's max HP. If <link="s|192"><u>Midsummer</u></link> is active, deal <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> more Bless damage to the target.
descSimple: Bless dmg (%s of Atk) to 1 foe. Restore Motoha's HP 20%. With Midsummer, deal bonus Bless dmg (%s of Atk) to target.

name: Wave Chaser

Spend 15% of her max HP to deal Bless damage to all foes equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Attack. While <link="s|192"><u>Midsummer</u></link> is active, increase critical rate by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> and damage by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>.
descSimple: Immediately gain Midsummer until end of next turn. Spend 15% of max HP to deal Bless dmg (%s of Atk) to all foes. With Midsummer, increase crit rate %s and damage %s.

desc: During battle, increase Motoha's Attack by 24 points for every 100 points of max HP above 8000, up to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>.

desc: When Motoha is overhealed, increase damage by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> for 2 turns.

descSimple: When Motoha is healed, if amount healed exceeds 15% of max HP, decrease Wave Chaser cooldown by 1 turn (up to 1 turn).

desc: When <link="s|192"><u>Midsummer</u></link> is active, increase critical rate by 10% and critical effect by 25%. Permanently decrease Wave Chaser's cooldown time by 1 turn.

name: Launched Fireworks
desc:
Seaside Tomoko's skills will grant Sparklers to foes.
When any ally uses a skill and the total number of Sparklers on enemies reaches 3, she activates Dazzling Fireworks: Deal Psy damage to all foes and decrease their damage by 20% for 1 turn. Heal all allies for a set amount of HP based on her Attack.
Dazzling Fireworks is an effect and its damage can't knock down foes.

The damage from Dazzling Fireworks varies based on the number of foes present.
Dazzling Fireworks deals 180%/150%/120%/100% of the original damage when there are 1/2/3/4+ foes, respectively.

If a foe is defeated, their Sparklers are randomly distributed to other foes.

name: Blooming Light
desc:
When a foe is hit by Launched Fireworks, decrease Defense. Effect can stack.
The second skill's recovery effect now applies to party.

name: Reflections of Fireworks
desc: Skill Level 1 and 2 Up

desc: Every 2 times that Dazzling Fireworks is activated, grant 1 Sparklers stack to 1 random foe.

desc: Skill 3 and Battle Technique level up.

desc: Highlight effect up: Increase by 5 more.

name: If Tonight Could Never End
desc:
Change Launched Fireworks to Ascended Fireworks.
Ascended Fireworks always deals a Critical hit.
When a foe is hit by Ascended Fireworks, they will become frail, with a permanent effect stacking up to 3 times. At max stacks, enemies take more explosive damage.

name: How About Some Refreshments
desc:
Deal Psychokinesis damage to random foes equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Attack (4 hits). Prioritizes foes that have not been hit by this skill, and each hit applies 1 <link="s|193"><u>Sparklers</u></link> stack. Subsequent attacks on the same target deal 30% damage.
Passive: Increase skill damage multiplier and healing amount from <link="s|194"><u>Dazzling Fireworks</u></link> by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>.
descSimple:
Psy dmg (%s of Atk) to random foes (4 hits). Prioritizes foes not yet hit by this skill. Each hit applies 1 Sparkler. If same foe hit multiple times, deal 30% dmg.
Passive: Increase skill dmg multiplier and healing from Dazzling Fireworks %s.
contentBG: Every gulp of refreshing juice and ice-cold soda counters the burning heat of the sun, melting the worries of summer away.

name: Make Yourself at Home
desc: Restore 1 ally's HP by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Tomoko's Attack + <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>, increase their Attack by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>, and accuracy by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>. For each time and foe the ally deals skill damage to, grant 1 <link="s|193"><u>Sparklers</u></link> stack to the ally for 2 turns. During this period, <link="s|193"><u>Sparklers</u></link> can be applied up to 5 times.
descSimple: Restore 1 ally's HP by %s of Atk + %s. Increase target's Atk %s and ailment accuracy %s. Target's skill dmg will also grant 1 Sparklers to foes (2 turns). During this period, can grant Sparklers up to 5 times.
levelUpList: Healing Multiplier,Base Healing,Target Atk Increase,Target Effect Accuracy Increase
contentBG: A mirage wraps around the ally, forming a protective layer that gently heals all wounds from the hot summer days.

name: Midnight Memory
desc: Deal Psy damage to all foes equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Attack and increase their damage taken by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>. For 2 turns, apply 1 <link="s|193"><u>Sparklers</u></link> stack for each skill damage hit taken. At the start of Tomoko's turn, the duration decreases by 1 turn, and up to 5 stacks of <link="s|193"><u>Sparklers</u></link> can be applied during this period (this damage cannot activate the <link="s|193"><u>Sparklers</u></link> effect of this skill).
descSimple: Psy dmg (%s of Atk) to all foes and increase dmg taken %s. Whenever a foe takes skill damage, grant 1 Sparkler (2 turns) to each foe. At start of Tomoko's turn, decrease duration 1 turn. During this period, can apply Sparklers up to 5 times (this dmg cannot trigger Sparkler effect of this skill).

name: Grim: No. 1
desc: When using a single-target attack skill, increase Attack by %s.

desc: When only 1 foe is present, increase party's Attack by %s.

name: Grim: No. 3
desc: When using a single-target attack skill, decrease target's damage by %s for 1 turn.

name: Grim: No. 4
desc: When using a single-target attack skill, increase damage to foes with less than 50% HP by %s.

name: Grim: No. 5
desc: When using a single-target attack skill, increase weakness damage by %s.

name: Grim: No. 6
desc: After dealing damage with a single-target attack skill, deal Almighty damage equal to 30% of that damage to all foes.

name: Brawl: No. 1
desc: When using a multi-target attack skill, increase Attack by %s.

name: Brawl: No. 2
desc: After using a multi-target attack skill, decrease user's damage taken by %s for 2 turns.

name: Brawl: No. 3
desc: Increase party's Attack by %s for each foe present.

name: Brawl: No. 4
desc: When dealing damage to a foe, increase their damage taken by %s for 2 turns. Stacks up to 2 times.

name: Brawl: No. 5
desc: When attacking all foes with a skill, increase damage to main target by %s.

name: Brawl: No. 6
desc: Increase multi-target attack skill damage by 50%. Damage taken by foes will be shared between all of them.

name: Teamfight: 2 Set
desc: Increase damage by 15% for each foe present.

name: Teamfight: 4 Set
desc: When attacking a foe with a skill, increase damage by 15% for each foe targeted. When using a multi-target attack skill, add 2 more foes to number of targets counted.

name: Panacea: No. 1
desc: Increase party's healing effect by %s.

name: Panacea: No. 2
desc: After using a healing skill, deal Almighty damage to 1 random foe equal to %s of Attack.

name: Panacea: No. 3
desc: Increase party's max HP by %s.

name: Panacea: No. 4
desc: After using a healing skill, deal damage to all foes equal to %s of amount healed.

name: Panacea: No. 5
desc: After using a healing skill, increase user and target's Attack by %s for 2 turns. Stacks up to 2 times.

name: Panacea: No. 6
desc: Increase ally damage based on their current HP. At 100% max HP, increase damage by 40%.

name: Healer: 2 Set
desc: At the start of each turn, restore 10% of party's max HP.

name: Healer: 4 Set
desc: After an ally uses a healing skill, deal damage to a random foe equal to 300% of surplus healing.

name: Protect: No. 1
desc: Increase party's Defense by %s.

name: Protect: No. 2
desc: Increase party's shield received by %s.

name: Protect: No. 3
desc: After a shielded unit takes damage, deal Almighty damage to the attacker equal to %s of Defense.

name: Protect: No. 4
desc: At the start of battle, grant a shield equal to %s of Defense to all allies. Lasts for 3 turns.

name: Protect: No. 5
desc: When granting a shield to a target, increase shield by %s of that shield's value. Lasts for 2 turns.

name: Protect: 4 Set
desc: After activating a skill and dealing damage, deal Almighty damage to the main target equal to 70% of shield. When taking damage from a foe, deal Almighty damage to the foe equal to 70% of shield.

name: Protect: 2 Set
desc: Increase Defense of shielded allies by 35%.

name: Protect: No. 6
desc: At the start of each turn, grant the target a shield equal to 20% of Defense. Lasts for 2 turns. While this shield is granted, increase target's damage by 25%.

name: Warding: No. 1
desc: When a buff is applied to the target, increase Attack by %s for 1 turn.

name: Warding: No. 2
desc: When an ally has a buff, increase damage by %s.

name: Warding: No. 3
desc: When granted a buff from an ally, increase Defense by %s for 2 turns.

name: Warding: No. 4
desc: When an ally's activated skill doesn't deal damage, increase party's damage by %s for 1 turn. Stacks up to 3 times.

name: Warding: No. 5
desc: On the target's action, increase Attack for 1 turn, based on %s of the Attack of the ally who last acted.

name: Warding: No. 6
desc: Each time an ally takes a buff skill, permanently increase user's Attack by 15%. Stacks up to 5 times.

name: Buffing: 2 Set
desc: On an ally's action, increase damage based on number of buffs granted. Increase by 3% per buff. Stacks up to 10 buffs.

name: Buffing: 4 Set
desc: Increase party's damage by 25%. Increase user's damage by 7.2% for each buff. Stacks up to 8 times.

name: Purge: No. 1
desc: After inflicting a debuff on a foe, %s% chance to inflict 1 stack of <link="s|167"><u>Agony</u></link>.

name: Purge: No. 2
desc: Increase all continuous damage taken by foes by %s.

name: Purge: No. 3
desc: For each stack of <link="s|167"><u>Agony</u></link> inflicted on a foe, decrease Defense by %s.

name: Purge: No. 4
desc: After defeating a foe, inflict %s stacks of <link="s|167"><u>Agony</u></link> on all other foes.

name: Purge: No. 5
desc: When inflicting an elemental ailment on a foe, inflict %s stacks of <link="s|167"><u>Agony</u></link>.

name: Purge: No. 6
desc: For each stack of <link="s|167"><u>Agony</u></link> inflicted on a foe, 50% chance to reinflict Agony. This effect activates repeatedly and can inflict up to 30 stacks of Agony.

name: Debuff: 2 Set
desc: Increase damage taken by foes inflicted with <link="s|167"><u>Agony</u></link> by 30%.

name: Debuff: 4 Set
desc: When a foe takes damage from a skill, remove all stacks of <link="s|167">Agony</u></link>.

name: Scarlet Tide
desc: Deal Almighty damage to all foes.

name: Purity: 4 Set

name: Murky: No. 3
desc: Increase foes' damage taken from <link="s|170"><u>Scarlet Tide</u></link> by %s.

name: Murky: No. 4
desc: When an ally is hit by <link="s|170"><u>Scarlet Tide</u></link>, grant %s shield.

name: Murky: No. 5
desc: Increase damage from <link="s|170"><u>Scarlet Tide</u></link>, based on foe's missing HP. If below 30% HP, gain maximum effect and increase damage taken from <link="s|170"><u>Scarlet Tide</u></link> by %s.

name: Murky: 2 Set
desc: Increase <link="s|170"><u>Scarlet Tide</u></link>'s damage by 80%. When an ally is hit by <link="s|170"><u>Scarlet Tide</u></link>, grant 40% chance to resist being knocked down for 1 turn.

name: Murky: 4 Set
desc: Adds an effect to Power of Passion: for each stack, increase party's damage taken from <link="s|170"><u>Scarlet Tide</u></link> by 15%, and increase foes' damage taken from Scarlet Tide by 45%.

desc: Deal Almighty damage to all foes.

desc: Deal Almighty damage to all foes.

desc: Grant a random buff to 1 random ally. This effect can activate up to 10 times.

desc: Grant a random buff to 1 random ally. This effect can activate up to 15 times.

name: Sparkling Stage
desc: Grant a random buff to 1 random ally. This effect can activate up to 15 times.

desc: After an ally uses a Highlight, %s chance to reduce Elucidator's cooldown time by 1 turn.

name: Resound: 2 Set
desc: For each stage of damage dealt by <link="s|185"><u>Starfall</u></link>, increase weakness damage to foes by 5% for 2 turns. Stacks up to 5 times.

name: Resound: 4 Set

desc: Increase party's Attack by 25%, but decrease max HP by 15%. After collecting 3 or more, the negative effect is removed.

name: Stamp Card
desc: For every item purchased at a shop or Charm leveled up, increase party's Attack and Defense by 3%. Count: %s/10.

desc: Decrease party's damage taken by 3%.

desc: At the start of battle, increase party's Attack by %s for 3 turns.

desc: At the start of battle, increase party's critical rate by %s for 1 turn.

desc: After taking damage, gain 2 Fury stacks. For each stack, increase Attack and Defense by 1%. At 30 Fury stacks, increase user's Defense by %s.

name: Conqueror: No. 1
desc: Increase party's critical rate by %s.

desc: When an ally deals weakness damage, increase user's critical rate by %s for 2 turns.

name: Stormcaller: No. 5

name: Blink: No. 1
desc: Increase party's Attack by %s.

name: Blink: No. 2
desc: For every 10 Speed across the party, increase damage by %s.

name: Blink: No. 3
desc: At the start of battle, when turn order is decided or on the first turn, increase party's Speed by %s.

name: Blink: No. 4
desc: On an ally's extra action, increase critical rate by %s and increase critical damage by %s.

name: Blink: No. 5
desc: When an ally acts multiple times in a row, increase Attack by %s up to 4 times.

name: Blink: No. 6

name: Extra Action: 2 Set
desc: After defeating a foe, 25% chance to gain an extra action.

name: Extra Action: 4 Set
desc: At the end of the first turn, all allies gain an extra action.

name: Kagura: No. 1
desc: At the start of battle, fill Highlight Gauge by %s.

name: Kagura: No. 2
desc: At the start of battle, each time an ally uses a Highlight, increase party's Attack by %s. Stacks up to 10 times.

name: Kagura: No. 3
desc: When a Highlight deals weakness damage, fill the Highlight Gauge by %s.

name: Kagura: No. 4
desc: When a Highlight does not deal damage, fill the Highlight Gauge by %s.

name: Kagura: No. 5
desc: For 8 actions after using a Highlight, increase Highlight damage by %s. Stacks up to 3 times.

name: Kagura: No. 6
desc: After defeating a foe, fill the Highlight Gauge by 35%. When defeating a foe with a Highlight, fill it 35% more.

name: Highlight: 2 Set
desc: When a foe acts, fill the Highlight Gauge by 5%.

name: Highlight: 4 Set
desc: After an ally uses a Highlight, fill the Highlight Gauge by 30%.

name: Ritual: No. 1
desc: Increase Highlight damage to foes with less than 50% HP by %s.

name: Ritual: No. 2
desc: After an ally uses a Highlight, restore party's HP by %s of their max HP.

name: Ritual: No. 3
desc: After an ally uses a Highlight, increase the target's damage taken by %s for 2 turns.

name: Ritual: No. 4
desc: After using a Highlight on a foe, deal Almighty damage to target equal to %s of Attack 1 time.

name: Ritual: No. 5
desc: After an ally uses a Highlight, increase party's Attack by %s for 2 turns. Stacks up to 2 times.

name: Ritual: No. 6
desc: Decrease Highlight recovery rate by 25% and damage by 70%.

desc: After an ally uses a Highlight, increase Attack by 55%.

name: Highlight Follow-Up: 4 Set
desc: Increase Highlight damage by 30%. When using a Highlight, increase target ally's damage by 15% for 2 turns.

name: Special Effect: Ragnarok
desc: For every 3 actions taken by each ally, decrease max HP by 5%.

name: Erosion: No. 1
desc: Increase party's ailment accuracy by %s.

name: Erosion: No. 2
desc: When a foe is inflicted with a debuff, %s chance to inflict <link="s|168"><u>Infernal Curse</u></link> on the foe.

name: Erosion: No. 3
desc: Decrease Attack by %s, based on number of debuffs inflicted on all foes. Stacks up to 20 times.

name: Erosion: No. 5

name: Erosion: No. 6

name: Special Debuff: 2 Set
desc: Decrease Defense by 4.5% for each debuff on the foe. Stacks up to 15 times.

name: Special Debuff: 4 Set
desc: When a foe with a debuff takes damage from a skill, increase damage based on number of debuffs on the foe. Increase damage by 5.5 for each debuff. Stacks up to 15 times.

name: Pursuit: No. 1
desc: Increase party's critical rate by %s.

name: Pursuit: No. 2
desc: After using a skill to deal a critical hit on a foe, decrease Defense by %s for 1 turn.

name: Pursuit: No. 3
desc: When a target has any elemental ailment, decrease target's Attack by %s.

name: Pursuit: No. 4
desc: When a foe has <link="s|168"><u>Infernal Curse</u></link>, increase critical damage taken by %s.

name: Pursuit: No. 5
desc: When all foes have debuffs, increase party's critical damage by %s.

name: Pursuit: No. 6

name: Bullet Time
desc: Deal Gun damage to all foes equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Attack (3 hits). If a foe is Marked, increase damage by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> and critical damage by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>.
descSimple: Gun dmg to all foes (%s Atk, 3 hits). If foe is Marked, increase dmg %s and crit dmg %s.
contentBG: The shepherd's axes seem to stop in midair, and time freezes as enemies are pierced by a hail of bullets. Deals continuous damage to all enemies.

name: Tatra Shot
desc:
Deal Gun damage to 1 foe equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Attack. 75% chance to inflict Marked for 2 turns.
Marked: Decrease Defense by <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>.
descSimple: Gun dmg to 1 foe (%s Atk). Inflict Marked on foe.
contentBG: The firing pin strikes the bullet, igniting its gunpowder for a deadly blow that deals ailment damage. Increase damage when a foe has Marked.

name: Seize the Day
desc: Deal Bless damage to all foes equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Attack. Restore HP of the ally with the lowest remaining HP, equal to <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color> of Attack + <color=#FFFC40>^%s^</color>.
descSimple: Bless dmg to all foes (%s Atk). Restore %s HP of ally with lowest HP.
contentBG: The shepherd's axe blades trace an X through the air, dealing damage to enemies caught off guard. From the crosspoint, a beam of light offers healing to allies.

name: Hunting
desc: When any ally attacks a Marked foe, increase Attack by 15%.
descSimple: When ally attacks Marked foe, increase Atk 10%.

name: Hunting I
desc: AAAAAA==
descSimple: When ally attacks Marked foe, increase Atk 13%.

name: Hunting II
desc: AAAAAA==
descSimple: When ally attacks Marked foe, increase Atk 16%.

name: Hunting III
desc: AAAAAA==
